## Description {#details}

Data <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependence">Dependence</a> Graph <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> The graph can represent the following types of nodes:

<ul>
<li>Single instruction node containing just one instruction.</li>
<li>Multiple instruction node where two or more instructions from the same basic block are merged into one node.</li>
<li>Pi-block node which is a group of other DDG nodes that are part of a strongly-connected component of the graph. A pi-block node contains more than one single or multiple instruction nodes. The root node cannot be part of a pi-block.</li>
<li>Root node is a special node that connects to all components such that there is always a path from it to any node in the graph.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 44 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ddg-h">DDG.h</a>.

### collectInstructions() {#af91d9f50a649787e882b7383c7e997d3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DDGNode::collectInstructions (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">llvm::function&#95;ref</a>&lt; bool(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;)&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> &amp; Pred, <a href="#a8794d8cd663b73e93738b48ad9e1579d">InstructionListType</a> &amp; IList) const</>}>
Collect a list of instructions, in <code>IList</code>, for which predicate <code>Pred</code> evaluates to true when iterating over instructions of this node.

Return true if at least one instruction was collected, and false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ddg-h/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ddg-h">DDG.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ddg-cpp/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ddg-cpp">DDG.cpp</a>.
